title: It does one thing and does it incredibly well
text:
What a delight to come across an application that does one thing and does it tremendously well.

Really well thought through app that records and transcribes up to 90 minutes, super efficiently and also allows you to do so from your Apple Watch

You can now also create summaries from your transcription/recording. Very, very nice.

title: Outstanding!
text: Still cannot believe what whisper can do with my memos. Unbelievable!

title: Fantastic app
text: I use this app everyday. It’s reliable and highly intelligent in its transcription.

title: Please stop asking me to upgrade
text: I pay a yearly subscription, but when I open up the app the first thing I see at the top of the screen is a banner asking me to subscribe to an even higher tier. Bad experience.

title: Perfect for me
text: Speak into my Apple Watch - get an email with transcription. East peasy, lemon squeezee.

title: Off to a good start!
text: Used the free version in 2 meetings lasting over 45 minutes each.  Perfect recording.  Would like to see a fast forward option on the recording so I can focus on something I overlooked or misheard.

title: STOPS RECORDING FOR NO REASON
text: This app would be fine if it didn’t stop recording for no reason. I literally hit record and sat my phone down. I did not touch it at all during a 2 hour meeting. I picked it back up and it only recorded 14 minutes. This has happened multiple times now. HORRIBLE.

title: Brilliant
text:
With watch app I feel like Dan Dare pilot of the future. 

We live in amazing times.

title: Powerful transcription
text: Perfect for capturing dialogue and transcribing, the summation feature is very useful.

title: Remarkably accurate
text: Whisper Memos was recommended by a speaker at a conference and it’s a purchase I don’t regret. Its transcription is remarkably accurate and the app is well suited for how I use it.

title: External Brain
text: I love Whisper Memos! Often I am driving or on the go and can’t sit down to make notes or express thoughts, make a list, etc. but if I just open Whisper Memos and dump my brain contents there, the summary feature organizes it for me into really helpful categories! This makes executive function so much easier!

title: Easy capture
text: On my phone and watch, this allows me to capture ideas with minimal friction. It is easy to transfer items to other apps for processing

title: Killer app for Tesla drivers
text: The killer application of this app for me was being able to do voice dictation while sitting in my Tesla either driving or while I’m charging. I can then simply transfer the transcription and/or outline into whatever application I want to use to distribute it—email, iMessage, journaling app. Zero dropped connections.

title: Customer support is non-existent
text: I loved this app when it worked. Suddenly it did not and I received no response to 3 emails to customer support. I’m locked in paying for this until next June and requests for a fix or a refund have been ignored. Really disappointed.

title: Translates my English to German.
text: I set the language to English in the settings, but it doesn’t seem to matter. There’s no help function. Canceling.
